content: interfaces feature the following characteristics:  Are run by a set of redundant virtual service machines, by default.  Can fail over with up to three real devices.  Can be configured to be virtual LAN (VLAN)-aware.  Up to 2,048 virtual network interfaces can be coupled to a single VSWITCH. Chapter 2. Planning 55  Ports on VSWITCHES can be configured as USER-based or with port numbers.  Access and trunk ports can be configured for VSWITCHES.  VSWITCH network interfaces always operate on port 0 of the virtual device. Direct-attached Open Systems Adapter Linux uses the identical drivers to run a direct-attached OSA that it uses to run VSWITCH interfaces. With a direct-attached OSA, you get the fastest network connection to the external network. Direct-attached OSA network devices characteristics The administrator must be aware of the following issues about the use of a direct-attached OSA:  If a dual-port OSA is attached directly to a VM, the VM can choose whether it wants to
